name: Silicone Elastomer Gel SiCare® 9902
description: Silicone Elastomer Gel SiCare® 9902 is a compound with large molecular weight silicone cross-linking copolymer in decamethyl dimethicone. It feels soft and moist, silky smooth and dry refreshing with high powdery texture. It can cover tiny wrinkles and make wrinkle instant visually disappear with its elasticity. When added in make-up primer and foundation, it can greatly improve the spreadability of makeup products and make it look more skin-fitting and natural. With sebum-controlling and matt effects, it can lower the stickiness in formula and improve softness and smoothness. In this way, the product can last long on skin to improve the moisture retention.
